WoLLIC 2025 @ Porto.
Program Accepted Papers Committees Location Accommodation Sponsorship WoLLIC Series

Location

Porto is a fascinating and vibrant city that has so much to offer as a holiday or city break destination. The city boasts an extensive history, unique tourist attractions, delicious cuisines and buzzing nightlife. Porto has a delightful historic center and is famed for its Port wine, but it is also a young and energetic city, with social nightlife, liberal attitudes and a flourishing artisan scene. Take a look at this page for a quick guide of the city. The conference venue is the Department of Computer Science of the Faculty of Sciences, University of Porto and lunches are served at the Círculo Universitário do Porto.

Conference Room

Rua do Campo Alegre, 1021
Building FC6 - Computer Science (DCC/FCUP) - Room 0.29

Getting There…

The nearest airport to the city of Porto is the Sá Carneiro Airtport. From there, you can pick one of many efficient public transportation networks at your service on this page to get to the venue.

We recommend taking metro line E at the Botica metro station (located near the airport), and exiting at the Casa da Música metro station. From there, you can either: walk to the venue (aprox. 21 min); or take the 204 or 209 bus line available at the Casa da Música (Metro) bus station and exiting at the Faculdade de Ciências bus station. From there, you will find clear instruction guiding you to the venue. Lunches will be served at the Círculo Universitário do Porto.

You can find the location of the airport, all relevant metro and bus stations, and the venue on the map below. In order to navigate around the city center, we recommend using your favorite GPS navigation app.

For further information, please contact one of the local organizers (after the map).

Local Organizers
  • Mário Florido (Co-Chair) University of Porto
  • Sandra Alves (Co-Chair) University of Porto
  • João Barbosa University of Porto
  • Sabine Broda University of Porto
  • Miguel Ramos University of Porto
